about_the_game:
Dive into your worst nightmares with the Staircase 55 demo. You'll be gripping your flashlight tightly as you explore a dark unlit stairwell, but who knows if there's a bottom? And if there is, if you’ll make it down there alive?

Why would any sane person go down this stairwell? Well, none would. At least, not fully voluntarily. You take control of a prisoner who has been offered a chance at freedom. But you must first explore the stairwell and retrieve anything you might find. This exploration is funded and organized by the SCP foundation.

Try the Staircase 55 demo and get a taste of the full game. Get ready for a long and scary journey into the unknown. Can you survive the horrors in Staircase 55? Find out in the demo if you're up for it!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains scenes depicting mild violence and blood.

name: Staircase 55 - A SCP Story Demo
short_description: Explore a never-ending nightmare in the Staircase 55 demo. Can you survive the darkness? Try it now!
